text: Gambit is a 1966 American comedy thriller movie directed by Ronald Neame and starring Michael Caine, Shirley MacLaine, Herbert Lom, Roger C. Carmel, Arnold Moss. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1967. It was remade in 2012. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 comedy movies Category:1966 thriller movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Ronald Neame Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Gambit (movie)
